job.title: Software Developer
job.description:
Position Summary

The Programmer/Analyst will be responsible for web application development in VB.Net or C# and experience writing queries in a relational database. This position will assist a small team of developers in coding and modifying custom business applications and reports.

Position Responsibilities May Include, But Not Limited To
  • Design, develop and implement business applications using current technologies.
  • Develop design documents such as technical specifications, functional requirements, object modules, system test plans, technical and user documentation.
  • Ensure successful completion of projects.
  • Provide support to maintain existing Intranet, Extranet and Internet sites and applications
  • Document process flows.
  • Participate in team code reviews.
  • Develop small to medium scale applications with low complexity.
  • Other projects or duties as assigned.
Qualifications
  • Associate’s degree in Information Systems, Management Information System, Computer Science with at least 6 months of work experience or course work in software development.
  • Exposure to JavaScript and HTML
  • Exposure to development language such as .NET or Java
  • Exposure to database design
  • Exposure to multi-tier development, process flows, use cases, UML
  • Strong debugging skills
  • Understanding of Object Orientated Principles
  • Exposure to SDLC (Software Development Life Cycle) principles
  • Ability to set and meet deadlines on projects
  • The ability to communicate effectively through written and verbal communication, including strong presentation skills and the ability to communicate technical ‘speak’ to a non-technical audience
  • Desire to pursue career in Application Development
  • Ability to self-teach new IT technologies
  • This position must pass a post-offer background and drug test.
